title: Get ready for growth stocks to come roaring back to life says this top-performing manager. Here are his picks.
text:
Oil prices continue surge; Goldman Sachs lifts target to $90 a barrel

Goldman Sachs has boosted its oil price target to $90, citing the lingering impact of Hurricane Ida on supply while demand ramps up, particularly in COVID-averse Asia. See full story.

Why a tax on share buybacks could actually boost stock prices

Companies often use capital to repurchase overpriced shares, which hits earnings. See full story.

What will it take to dent this Teflon stock market? Here's how to invest, meanwhile.

What's it going to take to knock this U.S. equity market off-kilter? See full story.

The first electric truck hits the road, and it's not a Ford, Tesla or Hummer

It has a range of 314 miles, a separate electric motor for each wheel, and starts at $69,000. See full story.

MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE

Prosecutors say the men made phony claims for lost bags on dozens of flights. See full story.
